sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:m="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <AddSubscriptionDomain xmlns="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema"> <!-- nillable--> <user xsi:type="xsd:string">String</user> <!-- nillable--> <password xsi:type="xsd:string">String</password> <!-- nillable--> <clientTimestamp xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientTimestamp> <!-- nillable--> <clientIP xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientIP> <!-- nillable--> <clientOSUser xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientOSUser> <!-- nillable--> <company xsi:type="xsd:string">String</company> <!-- nillable--> <domain xsi:type="xsd:string">String</domain> <!-- nillable--> <subscriptionDomain xsi:type="m:SoapSubscriptionDomainDetails"> <!-- nillable--> <customPageURL xsi:type="xsd:string">String</customPageURL> <!-- nillable--> <description xsi:type="xsd:string">String</description> <groupEscalation xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</groupEscalation> <ignoreDeviceDelay xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</ignoreDeviceDelay> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> <notificationDelay xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</notificationDelay> <oneway xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</oneway> <overrideDeviceSeverity xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</overrideDeviceSeverity> <overrideDeviceTimeFrame xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</overrideDeviceTimeFrame> <!-- nillable--> <overrideDeviceTypes xsi:type="m:SoapOverrideDeviceTypes"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <deviceType xsi:type="m:SoapOverrideDeviceType"> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> </deviceType> </overrideDeviceTypes> <!-- nillable--> <subscriptionDefaults xsi:type="m:SoapSubscriptionDefaults"> <ignoreDeviceDelay xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</ignoreDeviceDelay> <overrideDeviceSeverity xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</overrideDeviceSeverity> <overrideDeviceTimeframe xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</overrideDeviceTimeframe> </subscriptionDefaults> <timeframe xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</timeframe> <!-- nillable--> <typeOfManagement xsi:type="xsd:string">String</typeOfManagement> </subscriptionDomain> <!-- nillable--> <responseChoices xsi:type="m:SoapResponseChoices"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <responses xsi:type="m:SoapResponseChoice"> <!-- nillable--> <response xsi:type="xsd:string">String</response> </responses> </responseChoices> <!-- nillable--> <predicates xsi:type="m:SoapPredicateNames"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <predicate xsi:type="m:SoapPredicateName"> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> </predicate> </predicates> <!-- nillable--> <roles xsi:type="m:SoapRoleList"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <role xsi:type="m:SoapRole"> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> </role> </roles> </AddSubscriptionDomain> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
